rules.name: Yes_BU_Approved
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 7 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 8)
rules.label: Yes, BU Approved (Finance Required)

rules.name: Yes_BU_Approved_No_Finance_Required
rules.label: Yes, BU Approved (No Finance or Ops Review Required)

rules.name: BU_Rejected_ProServ
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 6 AND 8 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 7)
rules.label: BU Rejected ProServ

rules.name: BU_Rejected_ProServ_ERP_ERP_MSP
rules.label: BU Rejected ProServ ERP & ERP MSP

rules.label: Tech Reject Fully Partner Delivered (All Sub Practices)

Flow.description: -Sub practices- ERP, Productivity-MSFT reverting back to No Finance and Legal approver before ops review.

formulas.name: approvalStatusBUFormula
formulas.expression: IF(AND( OR(TEXT({!sovOpp.Onica_Type__c}) = "ProServ",TEXT({!sovOpp.Onica_Type__c}) = "PSO"),OR(TEXT({!sovOpp.Type}) = "Professional Services", {!recordType.DeveloperName}="US_Cloud")), "BU Approval Required", "Finance Approval Required")

formulas.name: nextApprovalType
formulas.expression: IF( AND( OR(TEXT({!sovOpp.Onica_Type__c}) = "ProServ",TEXT({!sovOpp.Onica_Type__c}) = "PSO"), OR(TEXT({!sovOpp.Type}) = "Professional Services",{!recordType.DeveloperName}="US_Cloud")), "BU Approval", "Finance Approval")

Flow.label: Approver
